channel.title: Announcements Command
channel.description:
Hello, can someone make a command for me that only owners can use (Rights 3) I type ::announce text and it shows up as
[Server] - TEXT
Much appreciated. If this section is down for you and you want to make a topic paste this into address bar
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;board=48.0

item.title: Announcements Command
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

99% this won’t work, as I typed it into the reply box.

if(command.startsWith(“announce”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String stuffYelled = command.substring(9);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll(message(stuffYelled));
}

public String message(stuffYelled) {
String toSend = "[SERVER] - " + stuffYelled;
return toSend;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Announcements Command
item.dc:creator: @GlobalX GlobalX
item.description:
@GlobalX wrote:

Why not?.

Basiclly what im thinking is an exact copy of yell with Level 3 rights & instead of playername yells. change it to [Server].

So…?

Read full topic

item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:
